person.name: Gary J. Coleman
person.description: Elder Gary J. Coleman was called to serve as a member of the First Quorum of the Seventy of The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints in April of 1997 after serving in the Second Quorum of the Seventy since June of 1992. He currently serves as a counselor in the Caribbean Area. He previously served as assistant executive director of the Curriculum Department, president of the Mexico North Area, and counselor in the North America Northeast, North America Southeast and Mexico South Area Presidencies.
